channel.title: StockHedges
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from StockHedges, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Singapore Airlines shares fall 6% as profit nearly halves amid intensifying competition
item.description: The fall in profits was due to "increased capacity and stronger competition in key markets," the airline said.

item.title: Gold Futures Slip But Long-Term Safe-Haven Demand Looks Intact
item.description: Gold prices continued to slip as U.S. dollar-denominated commodities have been pressured in the wake of Donald Trump’s victory in the U.S. election.

item.title: Elliott Calls for Breakup of Honeywell---One of the Last Conglomerates
item.description: The activist investor, which has amassed a $5 billion stake, is calling for big changes. Honeywell shares were up about 5% on the news.

item.title: SoftBank posts blowout quarterly gains at Vision Fund tech arm
item.description: The company lodged a steep quarterly increase on Vision Fund gains after swinging back to black in the three months to June.

item.title: Natural Gas Future Fall After Strong Rally
item.description: Natural gas futures take a step back after Monday’s 10% rally prompted by cooling weather forecasts.

item.title: U.S. Stocks Fall as Bond Yields Rise and Bitcoin Sets Another Record
item.description: U.S. stocks edged lower after the S&P 500, Dow industrials and Nasdaq Composite hit fresh all-time highs Monday.

item.title: Nissan shares plunge over 10% after downbeat quarterly results, production-cut plans
item.description: The automaker posted disappointing second-quarter results and announced reductions in production and staff.

item.title: Home Depot’s sales are improving, but it says consumers are still cautious about spending
item.description: Home Depot is mired in a sales slump as homeowners put off major projects.

item.title: Dollar Keeps Rising Supported by Yields
item.description: The dollar continued to strengthen, supported by rising Treasury yields. Meanwhile, the yen’s weakness is unlikely to last even if the dollar remains ...

item.title: Sony raises guidance on gaming strength, quarterly operating profit beats estimates
item.description: Sony raised sales guidance for the full year and posted operating profit that smashed analyst expectations after a strong quarter for its gaming busin...
